section.title: Bug Reporting
section.p: MyFaces uses JIRA for reporting bugs, and for suggesting/requesting enhancements. These issues are automatically forwarded to the MyFaces development team. Please provide as much information as possible and include steps to reproduce the bug. If you have a solution to the bug please include a patch file. Here is a good link explaining some of the details associated with patch files.
